description: A single 30-year uncoupled (atmosphere and land) simulation in which sea suface temperature (SST) and sea ice distributions are specified and vegetation may interact.  Anthropogenic forcing agents are specified at present day 2015 values. Aerosols are specified by RFMIP.
keywords: RFMIP, Tier 2, Present day anthropogenic forcing, uncoupled, atmosphere-land, specified aerosol
long_name: RFMIP anthropogenic effective radiative forcing with specified aerosols
rationale: Quantify present-day total anthropogenic effective radiative forcing (ERF).
